title: BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop for Hard Floors and Area Rugs, Black, 2554A
descriptions:
**Advertising Description:**

Transform your home cleaning routine with the state-of-the-art BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop, model 2554A! This sleek, black machine is more than just a vacuum – it's also an advanced mopper, designed to effortlessly switch between wet and dry cleaning modes for hard floors and area rugs.

Equipped with a powerful rotating brush system, this versatile device boasts a generous 10.5-inch cleaning path that covers more ground in fewer passes. The swivel head maneuvers easily around furniture and edges, ensuring no spot is missed. Plus, its impressive battery life of up to 30 minutes ensures you can tackle even larger projects without interruption.

The BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max features a two-tank cleaning system, allowing you to maintain separate tanks for clean water and collected dirt – ensuring a thorough clean every time. And with improved edge cleaning technology, corners and baseboards are no longer neglected.

With the BISSELL Connect app compatibility, you can control and customize your cleaning experience from the palm of your hand. Plus, this innovative device is self-cleaning, making maintenance a breeze!

Supporting a great cause, a portion of every purchase goes to the BISSELL Pet Foundation – helping to ensure that pets in need find loving homes. The included accessories package comes with two multi-surface trial formulas, two hard floor sanitize trial formulas, and two multi-surface brush rolls.

Join the ranks of satisfied customers who have made the switch to the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max – say goodbye to the hassle of multiple cleaning tools and hello to a cleaner, more convenient home!

**Advertising Description:**

Transform your home cleaning routine with the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop, model 2554A! This innovative device combines vacuuming and mopping into one cordless machine, saving you time and effort.

Brand new from BISSELL, this black beauty boasts a rotating brush system with a cleaning path width of 10.5 inches that effectively tackles dirt, grime, and stains on hard floors and area rugs. Its swivel head allows for easy maneuvering around furniture and edges, while the improved edge-cleaning feature ensures no spot is missed.

The BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max comes with a powerful 36V Lithium-Ion battery that offers up to 30 minutes of cordless cleaning time – perfect for those large spaces or multiple rooms! And don't worry about constantly refilling the tanks; the clean water tank holds 28 oz and the dirt tank has a capacity of 18.6 oz, providing ample space for your cleaning needs.

This versatile machine supports various surfaces including tile, sealed wood floors, laminate, linoleum, rubber floor mats, pressed wood floors, and area rugs. With its two-tank technology, you can easily switch between vacuuming and washing modes, making it a true all-in-one solution for your home.

But that's not all – the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max is WiFi connected, enabling you to control and customize your cleaning experience via the BISSELL Connect app! And when it's time for a deep clean, simply activate the self-cleaning cycle.

BISSELL believes in giving back. A portion of your purchase goes to support the BISSELL Pet Foundation – helping to find forever homes for pets in need. Included with your purchase are two Multi-Surface Trial Formulas, two Hard Floor Sanitize Trial Formulas, and two Multi-Surface Brush Rolls to help you get started on your cleaning journey.

Don't settle for less; upgrade your home cleaning experience today with the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop!

✨Transform your home cleaning routine with the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop in Black, Model 2554A!✨

Discover the power of two functions in one innovative device: vacuum and wash. This versatile machine is perfect for hard floors and area rugs. Compatible surfaces include tile, sealed wood floors, laminate, linoleum, rubber floor mats, pressed wood floors, and area rugs.

Equipped with a rotating brush system, swivel head, and a cleaning path width of 10.5 inches, this sleek cordless machine offers improved edge cleaning for thorough results. The carry handle ensures easy portability from room to room.

The BISSELL CrossWave features a powerful 36V Lithium-Ion battery that delivers an impressive runtime of up to 30 minutes! It's wifi connected, enabling seamless integration with the BISSELL Connect app for added convenience. Plus, this marvel includes a self-cleaning cycle and two-tank technology.

Join forces with us in supporting a noble cause: a portion of every purchase goes to the BISSELL Pet Foundation to help save animals in need!

Your purchase comes complete with 2 Multi-Surface Trial Formulas, 2 Hard Floor Sanitize Trial Formulas, and 2 Multi-Surface Brush Rolls. Make your home sparkle while making a difference – order now!

**Advertising Description:**

Transform your cleaning routine with the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop, model 2554A! This innovative device combines vacuuming and mopping capabilities into one sleek, cordless design.

Brand new from BISSELL, this Black beauty supports the BISSELL Pet Foundation – a cause that cares for pets in need. With its rotating brush system, cleaning path width of 10.5 inches, and swivel head, it's perfect for navigating your home with ease.

Equipped with a powerful 36V Lithium-Ion battery, this cordless marvel delivers up to 30 minutes of cleaning time! Wet or dry – the CrossWave handles it all. Tackle surfaces like tile, sealed wood floors, laminate, linoleum, rubber floor mats, pressed wood floors, and area rugs with confidence.

Improve your edge cleaning game with the advanced design that reaches corners and edges more effectively than ever before. Plus, this machine is WiFi connected, making it compatible with the BISSELL Connect app for added convenience and customization.

The CrossWave's self-cleaning cycle ensures easy maintenance, while its two-tank technology keeps clean water and dirty water separate for optimal results. When you're done cleaning, store your machine easily with the carry handle.

Your purchase includes 2 Multi-Surface Trial Formulas, 2 Hard Floor Sanitize Trial Formulas, and 2 Multi-Surface Brush Rolls to get you started on your new cleaning journey! Experience the power of an all-in-one vacuum cleaner and mop today.

Introducing the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop, your ultimate floor solution for hard floors and area rugs! This game-changing innovation by BISSELL combines vacuuming and mopping into one sleek device, all cordlessly. With a powerful 36V Lithium-Ion battery, you'll enjoy up to 30 minutes of uninterrupted cleaning time.

Equipped with a rotating brush system and swivel head, this versatile machine tackles both large debris and stubborn dirt effortlessly. Its improved edge cleaning technology reaches even the hardest corners, leaving no spot untouched. The BISSELL CrossWave is compatible with various surfaces, including tile, sealed wood floors, laminate, linoleum, rubber floor mats, pressed wood floors, and area rugs.

But that's not all! This amazing product supports a great cause: the BISSELL Pet Foundation. Its two-tank technology ensures clean water for washing and dirty water for collecting, ensuring an efficient cleaning process. And when it's time for maintenance, the self-cleaning cycle takes care of it all.

The BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop includes two multi-surface trial formulas, two hard floor sanitize trial formulas, and two multi-surface brush rolls to get you started on your cleaning journey. Experience the convenience of a single device that vacuums and mops all in one, while making a difference for pets in need. Upgrade your home cleaning routine today with this revolutionary product!

**Advertisement:**

Transform your home cleaning routine with the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop, model 2554A. This innovative device combines the power of a vacuum cleaner and a mop, allowing you to effortlessly switch between washing and drying hard floors and area rugs. With its sleek black design and easy-to-maneuver swivel head, this cordless cleaning machine is a must-have for modern homes.

The BISSELL CrossWave features a rotating brush system that effectively tackles dirt, grime, and pet hair while providing improved edge cleaning. Its impressive 10.5-inch cleaning path width ensures quicker clean-ups, making your daily chores more efficient than ever before. The vacuum comes with a carry handle for added convenience, enabling you to move it around the house effortlessly.

This cordless marvel boasts a powerful 36V Lithium-Ion battery that delivers up to 30 minutes of cleaning time, allowing you to finish your tasks without interruptions. With its two tank technology, you can easily switch between cleaning solutions and clean water, ensuring optimal results for each surface type.

The CrossWave is compatible with various floor surfaces including tile, sealed wood floors, laminate, linoleum, rubber floor mats, pressed wood floors, and area rugs. As a socially responsible brand, the BISSELL CrossWave supports the BISSELL Pet Foundation, which helps save pets in need through pet adoption and emergency aid grants. By purchasing this product, not only will you be enhancing your home cleaning experience but also making a difference in the lives of many animals.

Join the ranks of satisfied customers who have embraced the power of the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop. Experience the freedom of cordless cleaning, the versatility of multi-surface functionality, and the peace of mind that comes with knowing you're making a difference. Order yours today!
